name: Dheeren Tejani
bio: Specializing in Generative AI, Custom LLMs, and High-Performance Optimization
title: AI Engineer

projects.title: Custom GPT-2 LLM (Built from Scratch)
projects.description: Engineered a 124M-parameter Transformer model entirely from first principles. Implemented Causal Self-Attention and trained on the C4 dataset using Mixed Precision (AMP) and 8-bit optimization to master the internal mathematics of Large Language Models.

projects.title: Latent Diffusion Model (Stable Diffusion)
projects.description: Built a complete Text-to-Image generation pipeline implementing the math behind Stable Diffusion. Architected a VAE for latent compression, a U-Net with Cross-Attention for text conditioning, and manual DDPM/DDIM noise schedulers.

projects.title: Image Upscaler
projects.description: A high-performance video enhancement engine achieving a 7x speedup using NVIDIA TensorRT. Features a producer-consumer threaded pipeline, async CUDA execution, and a full-stack React/FastAPI architecture for real-time 4K upscaling.

projects.title: Diabetic Retinopathy Diagnosis
projects.description: A Deep learning Classification + NLP model that detects Diabetic Retinopathy disease and classifies them into 5 classes + provide the lesions present in them and gives Natural Language diagnosis

projects.title: Cyberpunk Theme Image Generation
projects.description: An AI Image Generation application that generates high quality, multiple aspect ratios images from user prompts, it uses fine-tuned stable-diffusion 1.5 model

projects.title: Talk to your Data
projects.description: AI-powered data analysis app that supports multi-format dataset uploads, performs automatic data profiling (charts, completeness, missing values, domain detection), and enables conversational insights using RAG-based AI chat.

projects.title: Legal Document Analyzer
projects.description: AI application that let's user upload their legal documents, and the app performs analysis to detect risky clauses and subclauses, their severity level, and generate recommended improvisations on it

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: A content-based movie recommender that analyzes movie metadata to compute similarity scores and deliver intelligent suggestions. Built with Python, the system includes a Jupyter notebook for data processing and model generation, and a Streamlit app for an interactive user experience.

workExperience.company: Vivekanand Education Society of Arts, Science and Commerce (Autonomous)
